description: This CSS file defines styles for the theme management of a Tic Tac Toe web application, including light and dark theme color variables, styling for the main application interface, and responsive design elements.

classes.name: App
classes.description: The main application container class that centers the content and applies the primary background and text colors based on the current theme.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Class for the logo within the App, setting its height and pointer event styles.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Class for the header section of the App that styles the background, alignment, and transitions.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Class for links within the App, defining their color and transition effects.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Class for the button responsible for toggling the application theme, styled with colors, padding, border radius, and hover effects.
